book a tee time
Event Hosting
Clerbrook Golf & RV Resort is proud to host charitable and corporate events throughout the year. Our facilities can accommodate both small and large golfing and camping events. We have a wide range of facilities and staff to assist you in creating a lifetime memory. The RV resort has several accommodations from RV sites, rental units and clubhouse rentals to meet your needs. Host your next corporate, charity event, rally, birthday party or weekend getaway at Clerbrook Golf & RV Resort. Call now and speak to one of our friendly staff to assist you with your planning. Here are just a few of the events we are hosting this season.
Please visit our website at
www.rvonthego.com
to book a site for your RV or come stay in one of our completely furnished rentals.
BOOK NOW

book a tee time
Contact
We want to hear from you. Your questions and concerns are of the utmost importance to us. Please reach out to request additional information about our course, services and promotions. We’d also like to encourage you to voice any concerns you may have and let us know how we’re doing in our efforts to provide the best facility we can possibly provide.
Contact us:
Call 352-394-5513  for all park reservations
Call 352-394-6165  For all tee times

book a tee time
About Us
If you love the outdoors you’ll love everything Clerbrook Golf & RV Resort has to offer. We are one of the most sought after vacation destinations with high end amenities, action-packed and fun-filled activity calendars. With our commitment to quality service, we’ve got what your looking for. Clerbrook Golf & RV Resort has some of the most amazing staff in the industry, just waiting to assist you. Create memories with family and friends with all the amenities we have to offer. What’s best is that you get to choose just how you want to enjoy our resort. Whether you want to stay in the luxury of your own RV, rent a cozy cabin or cottage, the choice is yours. There are several amenities Clerbrook Golf & RV Resort has to offer to capture the needs of the entire family. Grab your golf clubs and play a round of golf or enjoy our action packed calendar of events. Our public golf course is available for a day of golf, family gathering, charitable events or company outings. Call us today and take advantage of everything we have to offer.
We look forward to seeing you,
Roger Metzger,
Golf Course Director
Contact Information
Address
20005 Highway 27 North
Clermont, Florida 34715
